embed.title: :scroll: When submitting a ticket, we ask that you please follow these guidelines:
embed.description:
1. **Reporting a Server Member**
  - Provide clear evidence: When reporting someone for misconduct, include screenshots, chat logs, or any other evidence to support your claim. This helps staff assess the situation accurately. [Click here on how to find a member's ID](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/206346498-Where-can-I-find-my-User-Server-Message-ID).
  - Be objective: Stick to facts and avoid assumptions or unfounded accusations. Present the situation calmly and respectfully.
2. **Appealing an Infraction**
  - Understand the rules: Before appealing, make sure you're familiar with the server's rules. Understand why the infraction was issued and whether you believe it was justified.
  - Provide context: Share your side of the story and include any relevant context that may have been overlooked. Be honest and transparent.
3. **Submitting Formal Inquiries**
  - For formal matters, such as partnerships, serious concerns, or private questions, please submit a ticket. This ensures your message reaches the appropriate staff member or channel.
4. **Using the Public Support Thread for General Questions**
  - **For all other questions or general help**, please use the public support thread (https://discord.com/channels/781422576660250634/1203404592268705842). Only open a ticket for the situations listed above (e.g., reporting members, appealing infractions, or submitting private/formal inquiries). This keeps sensitive matters private, allowing staff and the community to handle everyday questions more efficiently.
  - Check existing resources: Before posting, check FAQs, documentation, or previous posts to avoid asking something that’s already answered.
  - Be concise: Keep your question concise and clear—provide enough detail for a helpful response without overwhelming the thread.

If you open a ticket and don’t respond to staff, you will receive a reminder. If there’s still no reply after that, the ticket will be closed due to inactivity.
